meanings.definition: To undergo epimerization, a chemical process in which a molecule is transformed into its epimer.
meanings.sent1: The compound epimerized during the reaction, changing its structure.
meanings.sent2: The sugar epimerized to form its mirror image.
meanings.sent3: The molecule epimerized itself, surprising the scientists in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The chemical reaction epimerized the compound, creating a new form.
meanings.sent5: The process of epimerization made the molecule unrecognizable.

meanings.definition: Having undergone epimerization, resulting in a change in configuration at one or more chiral centers.
meanings.sent1: The epimerized sugar had a different shape compared to the original.
meanings.sent2: The epimerized molecule exhibited altered properties.
meanings.sent3: The epimerized compound stood out among the other substances.
meanings.sent4: The epimerized structure puzzled the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The epimerized form of the molecule was distinctively different.
